name: Jaxon: Reloaded
description:
In Jaxon: Reloaded, you play AS Jaxon. If it wasn't obvious enough. (Jaxon is pronounced as "Jackson")

Jaxon: Reloaded is a slight reboot of its predecessor, Jaxon (https://dunster.itch.io/jaxon), which was made for a previous game jam. A short fun experience that is still filled to the brim with content and offers much replay value. 

The story of Jaxon: Reloaded goes as follows: In the distant, dystopian, cyberpunk future, the military uses robots as soldiers and manages them through a single network. One day however, the robots go haywire due to a bug created by the AI system that manages all these robots. The robots are unleashed and start attacking everywhere. Jaxon, a mercenary who roams the city, is caught in the ensuing chaos and decides to take matters into his own hands and solve this problem himself.

Collect cash by pocketing the money strewn throughout the levels and defeating enemies. With that cash, you can buy better weapons and body enhancements for Jaxon in the Black Market.

P.S: If you encounter any "bugs", they were "purposely" intentional. ;)

Some "legitimate" ratings from "legitimate" reviewers

"10/10, one of the best" - IGN   

"9/10, inspired a generation" - Metacritic                         

"9.5/10, truly a masterpiece" - Dustman
